titles.title: COVID Health Care Provider Assurance Act of 2020
COVID Health Care Provider Assurance Act of 2020
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure adequate payment for certain physicians' services furnished under part B of the Medicare program during the COVID-19 public health emergency.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
COVID Health Care Provider Assurance Act of 2020
This bill provides for specific coverage and increased payment under Medicare for certain critical care services that are provided by physicians during the public health emergency relating to COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
